com.dhbikoff.breakout

Class Splash

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • com.dhbikoff.breakout.Splash

  • public class Splash
extends Activity
    This is the main Activity class for Breakout. The user can choose to start a new game or continue a saved game. The user can also toggle sound effects on or off. Displays the user's high score.

    • Method Detail

      • onCreate

        protected void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState)
        Initializes the Activity. Sets the layout. Acquires media volume control.
        Parameters:
        savedInstanceState - saved data from previous run

      • fetchHighScore

        private int fetchHighScore()
        Fetches the user's high score from saved data file.
        Returns:
        saved player's score. Zero if no data found.

      • showHighScore

        private void showHighScore()
        Prints the player's high score to screen.

      • newGame

        public void newGame(View view)
        Callback function for the New Game Button when clicked. Combines the sound on or off selection and the newGame value in the intent. Launches the Breakout class and signals a new game.
        Parameters:
        view - new game button view

      • contGame

        public void contGame(View view)
        Callback function for the Continue Game Button when clicked. Combines the sound on or off selection and the newGame value in the intent. Launches the Breakout class and signals that the saved game data should be read.
        Parameters:
        view - continue game button view

      • onResume

        protected void onResume()
        Called when this Activity is resumed. Restores the sound on/off button state and high score value.

      • soundToggle

        public void soundToggle(View v)
        Callback function for when the sound on/off button is clicked. Sets the sound boolean in response to the button state.
        Parameters:
        v - sound toggle button

      • onPause

        protected void onPause()
        Called when the system pauses this Activity. Saves the sound button state and high score value.
